New repo - FoundationSafety

14 Jun 2014

Introducing FoundationSafety

Who here hasn't caused a crash in production because of an out of bounds exception on an NSArray, or a valueForUndefinedKey for an NSDictionary? FoundationSafety is a collection of categories designed to make working with Foundation collections safer.

Published on 14 Jun 2014 • Find me on Twitter!
